artifact_debut.puzzle_notice1: Uncover the whole puzzle to obtain {0} x{1} and {2} x{3}.
artifact_debut.puzzle_noconfirm: Insufficient hammers, complete the quests first!
artifact_debut.puzzle_fail1: Can't claim the reward yet! Break a row or column first.
artifact_debut.big_prize_desc: Break all the grids to claim rewards.
artifact_debut.choose_desc1: Please select your desired Legendary Relic.
artifact_debut.choose_desc2: The selected Legendary Relic can be changed anytime during the event.
artifact_debut.login: Log in for a total of {0} day(s).
artifact_debut.note_shop: After the Event Shop closes, unused {0} will be converted into {1} x{2}.
artifact_debut.draw_count_desc: Accumulate the specific number of forges at the Mystic Forge—Advanced Forging to claim reward.
artifact_debut.draw_count_nobuy: Forge a total of {0} times at the Mystic Forge—Advanced Forging.
artifact_debut.achieve.notice: Log in for a specific number of days to claim rewards.
artifact_debut.draw_disappear: New Relics have arrived! Collect Mythic Stones and toss them into the boiling furnace to forge new Relics.
artifact_debut.desc2: The selected Legendary Relic can be changed anytime during the event.
artifact_debut.puzzle_rule_desc: For every 1 row/column of grid knocked out, you can get a reward. Knock all the grids out to get the ultimate prize.
artifact_debut.note_summon_guarantee: For every 5 forges, obtain a guaranteed <color=@000115>{0} Shard</color>.
artifact_debut.note_summon_round: Forging only yields <color=@000088>Relic Shards</color>, with <color=@000088>significantly increased</color> chances for the selected Relic.
